dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 40 IH: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Defense relating to “Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) Program”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Clyde submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Defense relating to Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) Program.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Defense relating to Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) Program (89 Fed. Reg. 83092 (October 15, 2024)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.
